channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: GitLab patches major security flaw - here's what we know
item.description: A new patch fixes six important flaws, including ones allowing for 2FA bypass.

item.title: Here’s what you should know about the US TikTok deal
item.description: A number of investors are competing for the opportunity to purchase the app, and if a deal were to go through, the platform's U.S. business could have its valuation soar to upward of $60 billion.

item.title: Android prépare un mode « Transports en commun » pour faciliter vos trajets
item.description: Android s'apprête à transformer vos trajets quotidiens avec un nouveau mode « Transports ». Repéré dans le code du système, il promet d'automatiser vos réglages (Bluetooth, volume) et d'afficher vos infos en temps réel sur l'écran de verrouillage.

item.title: Nintendo’s Talking Mario Wonder Flower Is Somehow Less Annoying Than Most AI Gadgets
item.description: Nintendo's Wonder Flower toy joins Alarmo to annoy everybody in the bedroom.

item.title: Canon EOS R6 III review: A video powerhouse that's also great for photography
item.description: With video features like RAW now the norm on midrange mirrorless cameras, Canon decided not to mess around with its latest model, the 33-megapixel EOS R6 III. It’s a veritable cinematic beast, allowing up to 7K RAW video capture internally with fast and reliable autofocus and rock solid stabilization. At the same time, it's a solid photo camera with high burst speeds and warm, accurate image quality. The R6 III has stiff competition with Sony’s 33MP A7 V, though, as the latter delivers higher dynamic range. The price could also be an issue for buyers, as the R6 III costs $300 more than its pr...

item.title: AMD’s faster Ryzen 7 9850X3D CPU arrives on January 29th for $499
item.description: AMD announced an improved version of its popular Ryzen 7 9800X3D processor at CES earlier this month, and it's now confirming a release date and pricing today. The new Ryzen 7 9850X3D will debut on January 29th, priced at $499. That's $20 more than the initial retail pricing of the 9800X3D, and this faster 9850X3D […]

item.title: À ce prix-là, le pack Google Pixel 10 + Buds A est le super deal des soldes d’hiver
item.description: En plein cœur des soldes d’hiver, Fnac et Darty bradent le récent Google Pixel 10 à un prix particulièrement avantageux, avec en prime une paire d’écouteurs Buds 2a incluse pour rendre l’offre encore plus attractive.

item.title: Under Armour says it’s ‘aware’ of data breach claims after 72M customer records were posted online
item.description: TechCrunch obtained a sample of the stolen data, which contained names, email addresses, dates of birth, and the user's approximate geographic location. Under Armour confirmed some sensitive information was taken in the breach.

item.title: Forget boring office chairs — these IKEA picks will bring serious style to your workspace
item.description: A home office upgrade on the dull design of your usual office furniture.

item.description: Discover how organizations can turn AI adoption into lasting business value through culture and strategy.

item.title: Décision judiciaire | Ottawa suspend l’interdiction de TikTok au Canada
item.description: Le gouvernement fédéral a accepté de suspendre sa décision ordonnant la fermeture des activités canadiennes de TikTok.

item.title: How CIOs can shift from patch and pray to risk-based software change
item.description: Forced updates and “patch and pray” thinking are creating avoidable risk in life-critical systems. Vendor business models, built on upgrade pressure and baked-in greed, are driving that risk.

item.title: Lenovo ThinkPad P1 Gen 8 Review: A Laptop That Will Torpedo Your Work/Life Balance
item.description: It's got an incredibly bright OLED screen with performance that will keep you from using it for much else than work.

item.title: Google reportedly snags up team behind AI voice startup Hume AI
item.description: Google has hired the CEO and top top behind voice AI startup Hume AI, signaling that voice is increasingly becoming the preferred interface over screens.

item.title: E.Leclerc frappe fort à la 3e démarque : voici les 11 meilleurs deals Tech des soldes
item.description: La 3ᵉ démarque des soldes lance une nouvelle salve de bonnes affaires chez les e-commerçants, dont E.Leclerc qui met les bouchées doubles sur les produits Tech — smartphones, TV OLED, montres connectées, tablettes… avec une sélection de promos qui valent vraiment le détour.

item.title: The Switch 2 version of Super Mario Bros. Wonder arrives on March 26
item.description: While many of us wait (im)patiently for a brand new Mario platformer for the Switch 2, Nintendo is filling the gap with an upgraded version of the tremendous Super Mario Bros. Wonder for the console. Super Mario Bros. Wonder – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition + Meetup in Bellabel Park (to give the new edition's full name) will arrive on March 26. Those who own the original Switch version of the game will be able to buy an upgrade pack, which costs $20. There's a lot of new stuff in the Switch 2 version, including co-op and multiplayer features. Bellabel Park, a fresh area of the Flower Kingdom, will ...

item.title: It’s not a bubble, we’re surfing the AI wave
item.description: Is AI hype a fleeting bubble or a sustained wave reshaping business and technology?

item.title: From invisibility cloaks to AI chips: Neurophos raises $110M to build tiny optical processors for inferencing
item.description: Neurophos is taking a crack at solving the AI industry's power efficiency problem with an optical chip that uses a composite material to do the math required in AI inferencing tasks.

item.title: Spaceship web hosting review
item.description: Spaceship hosting offers low prices and decent performance, though it has a few quirks.

item.description: Plus, get a tiny tease for the debut of the next 'Star Wars' animated series, 'Maul—Shadow Lord'.

item.title: "In conclusion, the reviewed scope appears to be on a good security level compared to systems of similar size and complexity." — Independent review confirms Mullvad’s strong privacy protections
item.description: Mullvad’s latest security audit confirms that Mullvad’s account and payment services continue to meet high standards, finding no critical flaws.

item.title: Apple pourrait-elle faire payer le nouveau Siri ?
item.description: Siri va subir de gros changements cette année. Au printemps, l'assistant devrait gagner de nouvelles capacités pour répondre de manière plus pertinente et personnalisée aux questions de l'utilisateur ; et à la rentrée, il pourrait devenir un « vrai » chatbot, à la manière de ChatGPT. Mais tout cela sera-t-il gratuit ?

item.title: Anthropic has to keep revising its technical interview test so you can’t cheat on it with Claude
item.description: Since 2024, Anthropic's performance optimization team has given job seekers a take-home test to make sure they know their stuff — but as AI coding tools have gotten better, the test has had to change a lot to stay ahead of AI-assisted cheating.

item.title: Zendesk tickets hijacked in massive spam campaign
item.description: Someone is sending hundreds of pointless emails to people, using Zendesk's ticketing system.

item.title: Blue Origin schedules third New Glenn launch for late February, but not to the moon
item.description: Jeff Bezos' Blue Origin had previously suggested that the third launch of the mega-rocket would take the space company's robotic lunar lander to the moon.

item.title: This plugin uses Wikipedia’s AI-spotting guide to make AI writing sound more human
item.description: A new tool aims to help AI chatbots generate more human-sounding text - with the help of Wikipedia's guide for detecting AI, as reported by Ars Technica. Developer Siqi Chen says he created the tool, called Humanizer, by feeding Anthropic's Claude the list of tells that Wikipedia's volunteer editors put together as part of an […]

item.title: 3I/Atlas s’aligne avec la Terre et le Soleil cette nuit : après les images troublantes de Hubble, l’heure de vérité approche
item.description: Ces derniers jours, de nouvelles données concernant la comète interstellaire 3I/Atlas ont une fois de plus semé le trouble sur sa nature. Cette nuit, l’objet venu d'ailleurs va s’aligner avec la Terre, à l’opposé du Soleil. Une occasion unique pour comprendre enfin de quoi il est fait.

item.title: 4 To de stockage : ce disque dur est soldé à -41%, une aubaine rare en pleine pénurie de stockage
item.description: Ce disque dur externe de 4 To actuellement en promotion sur Amazon s’impose comme une vraie bonne affaire des soldes d’hiver, surtout dans un contexte où les solutions de stockage ont tendance à voir leurs prix grimper.

item.title: Sinners just smashed an Oscars record
item.description: Ryan Coogler's "Sinners" has just hit an Oscars record out of the park, landing a whopping 16 Academy Award nominations.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs écouteurs filaires en 2026 ? Notre sélection

item.title: Nintendo is following up Alarmo with a weird Talking Flower in March
item.description: After sharing a brief look at its new Talking Flower toy during a Nintendo Direct showcase last September that generated more questions than answers, Nintendo has finally revealed more details about what the interactive toy actually does. It shares some functionality with Nintendo's Alarmo alarm clock, but the Talking Flower seems more like a talkative […]...

item.title: Trump unveils his Board of Peace at Davos, but many top U.S. allies are opting out. Here’s why
item.description: Trump said 59 nations had signed onto the board, but officials from only 19 countries actually attended the inaugural party. President Donald Trump on Thursday inaugurated his Board of Peace to lead efforts at maintaining a ceasefire in Israel’s war with Hamas, insisting that “everyone wants to be a part” of the body that could eventually rival the United Nations — despite many U.S. allies opting not to participate.In a speech at the World Economic Forum, Trump sought to create momentum for a project to map out a future of the war-torn Gaza Strip that has been overshadowed this week, first by ...

item.description: En Espagne, des centaines de commerces permettent désormais aux enfants d'appeler leurs parents gratuitement. Une solution pragmatique pour contrer l'achat précoce du mobile.

item.description: 'KPop Demon Hunters,' 'Avatar: Fire and Ash,' and 'Zootopia 2' also got Oscar nominations, which will be awarded on March 15.

item.title: Nvidia a trouvé une solution contre les scalpers, mais elle ne changera sûrement pas grand chose
item.description: Pour faire face à la pénurie de cartes graphiques, Nvidia change sa manière de vendre ses modèles pour mettre des bâtons dans les roues des scalpers.

item.title: Mieux que les officiels ? Voici les premiers Joy-Con tiers pour la Nintendo Switch 2
item.description: Voici les premiers Joy-Con alternatifs pour la Switch 2 ! Depuis la sortie de la console, on n'a pas d'autre choix que d'utiliser les manettes de Nintendo. NYXI est parvenu à créer un remplaçant viable et plus ergonomique.

item.title: 1Password is introducing a new phishing prevention feature
item.description: A successful phishing attack can cost a business an average of $4.8 million, according to research from IBM. To help reduce the risk of one succeeding, either at work or at home, 1Password is introducing a new phishing prevention feature that will watch for telltale signs of an attack, such as a website URL that's […]

item.title: Adobe is developing ‘IP-safe’ gen AI models for the entertainment industry
item.description: As Hollywood continues to embrace generative AI, Adobe is taking steps to make its Firefly suite of creative tools the go-to for studios' entertainment production needs. Timed to this year's Sundance Film Festival, Adobe has announced that it is working with a number of studios, directors, and talent agencies to develop "private, IP-safe" Firefly Foundry […]...

item.title: Waymo is accepting public riders in Miami
item.description: Waymo is kicking off the new year with a new city: Miami. Starting today, anyone on the company's waitlist of approximately 10,000 people can hail one of its robotaxis for trips within a 60-square-mile service area that includes popular neighborhoods like the Design District and Wynwood, Brickell, and Coral Gables - but not popular tourist […]

item.title: Spotify brings AI-powered Prompted Playlists to the U.S. and Canada
item.description: Now available in the US and Canada, Spotify's AI-powered Prompted Playlists let users describe what they want to hear using natural language commands.

item.title: I’ve been trying out Spotify’s new Prompted Playlist tool, and it could be a smash hit if the platform tweaks these minor issues
item.description: Spotify just launched Prompted Playlists in the US and Canada, and it's a clever new playlist-making tool, but it could do with some TLC.

item.title: 1Password boosts built-in phishing protections – simple URL detection tool could save users millions of dollars and prevent hackers stealing banking details
item.description: 1Password has announced a new phishing protection tool that will help users avoid typo-squatting URLs.

item.title: 1Password adds an extra layer of phishing protection
item.description: 1Password has a new tool designed to counteract the advantages AI has given to phishing scammers. A new feature for the company's browser extension gives you a "second pair of eyes" to help you catch a bogus website before entering your login info.Before AI, phishing attempts often included telltale signs like obvious typos or rudimentary graphic design. Now that AI makes it much easier to design and code convincingly, scams are on the rise. According to Fortune, 60 percent of companies reported an increase in fraud-related losses from 2024 to 2025. And the advent of AI browsers could make thi...

item.title: A-List creatives sign up to fight AI, say it enables 'theft at a grand scale'
item.description: Scarlett Johannsson, R.E.M., Vince Gilligan and over 700 other artists are demanding that tech companies stop “stealing” their work in order to train AI models. A new campaign called “Stealing isn’t Innovation” demands that AI companies take “the responsible, ethical route” through licensing and partnerships, according to the website. “America’s creative community is the envy of the world and creates jobs, economic growth and exports,” a statement on the website reads. “But rather than respect and protect this valuable asset, some of the biggest tech companies, many backed by private equity an...

item.title: Spotify's Prompted Playlist lets you describe exactly what you want to hear
item.description: Ahead of its upcoming price hike, Spotify is rolling out a more advanced AI playlist feature in the US and Canada. Prompted Playlist, which the company trialed in New Zealand late last year, lets subscribers "control the Spotify algorithm," as the company describes it. "You're not just asking for music, you're shaping how Spotify goes about discovering it for you."For example, you can guide it to make a playlist of songs you've saved to your Library but haven't listened to yet. (It can tap into your entire Spotify history.) Or, you can tell it to round up songs from a specific television show ...

item.title: Spotifys Prompted Playlist lets you micromanage your own algorithm
item.description: Spotify's new Prompted Playlist feature pulls from your long-term listening data and real-time cultural signals.

item.title: Netflix is live broadcasting ‘Free Solo’ climber Alex Honnold’s ascent of this Taipei skyscraper
item.description: Although Honnold isn’t the first climber to ascend the skyscraper, he will be the first to do it without a rope. Towering high above Taiwan’s capital city at 1,667 feet (508 meters), Taipei 101 dominates the skyline.The earthquake-proof skyscraper of steel and glass has captured the imagination of professional rock climber Alex Honnold for more than a decade. On Saturday morning, he will climb it in his signature free solo style — without ropes or protective equipment. And Netflix will broadcast it — live.The event’s announcement has drawn both excitement and trepidation, as well as some conce...

item.title: Elizabeth Holmes Has Seen What Trump’s Done for Fraudsters and Wants That for Herself
item.description: The Theranos founder isn't scheduled to be released from prison until 2031.

item.title: Le règne du lithium menacé ? Le n°1 mondial dévoile une batterie au sodium aux performances inédites
item.description: CATL, n°1 mondial du secteur, vient de présenter une nouvelle génération de batteries au sodium : la Tectrans II. Elle promet des performances inédites par grand froid, et ses capacités d'autonomie et de recharge rapide s'améliorent.

item.title: C’est le grand déstockage côté smartphones lors des soldes : le TOP 20 des offres Samsung, Google, Apple, Xiaomi…
item.description: La troisième démarque des soldes d’hiver bat son plein, et les offres sur les smartphones s’intensifient ! De nombreux modèles, dont d’anciens flagships comme le Galaxy Z Flip 6 ou le Pixel Fold 9 Pro profitent de belles remises, allant jusqu’à -50 %. C’est le moment idéal pour profiter de la seconde moitié des soldes et dénicher de très belles affaires ! ...

item.title: Razers BlackShark V2 Pro wireless gaming headset is down to its lowest-ever price on Amazon
item.description: Razer’s BlackShark V2 Pro wireless Xbox headset is down to $99.99 at Amazon, marking its lowest price ever.

item.title: Get one year of access to one of our favorite budgeting apps for only $50
item.description: A new year is the perfect time to get your spending in order, and if you're not trying to build your own spreadsheet, budgeting apps are one of the best ways to do it. To save yourself some money in the process, you can pick up a year-long subscription to Monarch Money, one of Engadget's favorite budgeting apps, for just $50 if you use code NEWYEAR2026 at checkout and you're a new subscriber. That's a 50 percent discount on the service's normal $100 price. Monarch Money makes for a capable and detailed budgeting companion. You can use the service via apps for iOS, Android, iPadOS or the web, a...

item.title: Buc-ee’s expanding to 8 new states: See list of locations and opening dates for mega gas station chain—including its largest one ever
item.description: The popular Texas-based chain is growing its footprint with a number of new convenience stores, including a 76,245 square-foot location in Florida. Buc-ee’s, the popular Texas-based mega gas station chain, will be opening its first-ever locations in: Arizona, Arkansas, Kansas, Louisiana, Nebraska, North Carolina, Ohio, and Wisconsin, according to multiple local news reports....

item.title: Grab eight Pokémon TCG Journey Together Booster Packs at $16 off on Amazon
item.description: Get eight Pokémon TCG Journey Together booster packs for $16 off at Amazon, giving you 80 cards at one of the best prices right now.

item.title: IA générative : des centaines d’artistes américains dénoncent un « vol à grande échelle »
item.description: Plusieurs centaines d'artistes, de chanteurs, d'acteurs et d'auteurs américains participent à une campagne pour dénoncer « le vol à grande échelle » pratiqué par les acteurs de l'IA pour entraîner leurs modèles. Parmi les signataires, de grands noms comme Scarlett Johansson, Billy Corgan et George Saunders.
